p: However, the ethyl acetate fraction of Opuntia stricta flower extract was reported to have antineoplastic activity against HepG2 cell line [ 95]. Betalains, which are water-soluble nitrogenous pigments present in flowers and fruits of Opuntia spp., have also been reported to have good antineoplastic activity against some cancers[ 96][ 97]. Betalains from the fruit of Opuntia ficus indica was shown to induce apoptosis in chronic myeloid leukaemia, K562 cell line [ 98] Opuntia stricta is known to have the highest total betalain content among all the Opuntia spp. studied[ 23]. So it is possible some other parts of the plants have compounds with antineoplastic activity.
